page.title: 03THE LIFE OF A FOREST RANGER
page.content: There are four Forest Rangers and a tractor driver fully employed by the { {Ashdown Forest Centre}.They lead a strenuous but enjoyable outdoor life. Their busiest time is during the summer months of June, July and August as this is the time the forest is in most use by the general public for picnicking, walking and riding. Besides{forest management}the ranger maintains parking areas,constructs fire breaks and keeps a watchful eye on the wild life.The {Forest Centre {has a}comprehensive display and record of the natural attractions of the area.The main problems facing the forest ranger are caused by the number of people visiting the area.{Pollution and the associated problems of fire and wilful distruction of trees are all part of the rangers daily problems.
